website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for sandals that are comfortable for most, attractive, and stylish, this pair has almost every feature that women love in sandals, making them a worthy investment in style.
pros: In addition to the good-looking 2-inch heel, leather workmanship, and styling that goes with casual and dressy fashions, they earn praise for excellent arch support and quality
cons: Most wearers should expect a short break-in period
Some women with heel issues may find them too firm
however, most rave about the comfort level

customer_reviews.title: I love Naot sandals and the Paris style is a favorite of mine.
customer_reviews.text: I love Naot sandals and the Paris style is a favorite of mine. I have chronic plantar fasciitis in both feet. I usually need to wear orthotics in my shoes and still often have pain. With this brand and style I don’t need orthotics and can walk all day pain free. Unfortunately, this style is getting hard to find. I’m afraid they may have discontinued this style. If you find it in your size, grab it while you can.
customer_reviews.author: Cmptrsue

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly Cute Comfort
customer_reviews.text: AMAIZING Shoes! I have been wearing these same model of sandals for 10 years now, and finally felt corageous enoug to purchase them on the internet to save some money, and they are wonderful!! I hope they never stop making these shoes because they are the only sandals I can wear comfortably all day, walk several miles in and look great with a dress. A tiny bit of "fashion" is sacrified for heavenly comfort, but for the sliight bulkiness of the shoe it is well worth it! Worth every penny! AND you can replace the incerts, and the sandals feel good as new so they last a good 1-3 years depending on how much you walk.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Chase

customer_reviews.title: Naots quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are comfortable from the moment you put them on, and the sale price put them within my budget. The design of the lip on the foot bed does give the appearance the shoe is larger than need be, but my foot fits the lined portion of the shoe with perhaps 1/4 inch to spare, It is my opinion had I gotten the size 8, my toes would rest on the stitched lip and been uncomfortable. I love Naot shoes, they are quality, I wish they weren't quite so expensive, my closet would be full of Naot shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lesleigh

customer_reviews.title: First time buying shoes on-line and happy with what I received.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy shoes on-line as fit and comfort are so important. I choose NAOT because a friend from England said she had purchased a pair and they were great for walking. I also noticed that NAOT had free shipping on returns which minimized the risk I felt I was taking. My English friend said she ordered a size 38 which is an American 7 and that's what I ordered since I'm a size 7. I am happy to report that the size 7 fit perfectly. The shoe is very comfortable and appears to be well-made. I began wearing them the day after I got them and haven't experienced any discomfort or problems.
customer_reviews.author: Raine

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy for plantar fasciitis -- and really cute, too
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because they have the same footbed as my favorite Naots from 6 years ago that have practically worn out! I have a very high arch and am on month 9 of healing plantar fasciitis in one foot. These are great for both of those issues because the heel has a lot of give to it, and the footbed conforms to support your foot. I adore Naots as a rule because they look kind of edgy/cute and not at all like orthopedic sandals! I have a feeling these will be my go-to sandals for summer.
customer_reviews.author: RaisinBran

customer_reviews.title: These run large
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Naot brand, but the sizing seems to be inconsistent so wanted to warn others. I usually wear an 8 but ordered the 7 in this style ( I think some one else said this in another review when I was shopping) and it's still kind of big! So, order a size down. That said, they are really comfortable and I like that the metallic color is sort of neutral and goes with lots of things. They are really comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!  Great for people with bad feet like me.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I have plantar fasciitis and wear special orthodics. It's really hard to find summer shoes to go with my cute dresses that provide good support. This particular style does have a little less arch support than other Naot shoes. I also like that they have an adjustable velcro strap as I have very narrow ankles. I ordered a size 39 which is equivalent to an 8. I typically wear an 8.5, however, I think that a 9 would have been too big. I've got my eye on a few other pairs I may purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica McGee

customer_reviews.title: Feet feel great
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are comfortable and really good she. We walked over 130 miles on a vacation! I have a wide foot by felt as though they were wide but they are easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Strap cut into my baby toe.
customer_reviews.text: I did not find these shoes comfortable at all. The side strap cut into my baby toe so that it turned bright red in excruciating pain. I have never had a problem with that toe on any other sandle. These straps were badly placed for my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Fredericksburg, VA

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Needed comfortable black shoes for dress up and/or casual. These are perfect. I have other shoes with this foot bed and they provide the support I need.
customer_reviews.author: AKS

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: The copper color is unique, still a neutral, and good for dressing up or casual. Even my partner commented on how he liked them! Super comfortable. I normally wear a 6 1/2. With even sizes only, I sized up to 7.
customer_reviews.author: C. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: The Knee Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of pairs of these sandals and I love them. They are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hubble

customer_reviews.title: The foot bed felt great, like they would be nice shoes to wear ...
customer_reviews.text: The straps across the forefoot are not adjustable and were too tight. The foot bed felt great, like they would be nice shoes to wear walking around, but the tightness across the ball of the foot made me send them back.
customer_reviews.author: IOpine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sandal
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and the look, can go casual or dressy
customer_reviews.author: Tangie Rumbold

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent sandal
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very well made, as is expected of this brand and in this price range. I wear a between 6-1/2 and 7 wide. I ordered a 38 and it fit comfortably out of the box. I've worn these shoes all day at work, and also all day traveling and have had no problems at all. I am particularly fond of the bronze color, which goes with almost every color of clothing. These shoes can be worn with pants or casual dresses. I would purchase this shoe again.
customer_reviews.author: BPL

customer_reviews.title: Not Noat’s best, but good
customer_reviews.text: Good, but not great as Noats usual. I like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Mishifu

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Naoter
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a total 14 pairs in Naot Shoes, boots and sandals. This pair of shoes was surprisingly extremely poor. However, the vendor/Amazon graciously allowed me to return the shows. Amazon is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I think I bought them last year or the one before, still looks good, I wear them around our property, I have retired them to work around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Love Naot. Had these sandals from a purchase years ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Naot. Had these sandals from a purchase years ago, wore constantly, couldn’t find till I found them again here. Love them. They look good with everything! Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Twinmom

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable and good looking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The color on my monitor looks pink, but they are really light tan, otherwise they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Royce

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great and comfortable shoes, but a little "old lady" looking. I needed a sports type sandal to ride my bike in, and I thought these were much prettier than the sports sandals. Super comfy, but hard to size. I wear a US size 9, but the 40 was too small and the 41 too big. I kept the 41 because they were so comfy and I can walk in them all day, but they do look like an "older" person's shoe. Super expensive and much more than I would normally spend, but if price isn't a problem, I would suggest them for the comfort, if you don't mind the style.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Shoes looked better in the pic than they ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Shoes looked better in the pic than they do in person. The heel is very small, and it is more like a Birkenstock sandal than the classier Naot's I have bought in the past. Returning, as the fit was too large all around
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love Noat shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love Noat shoes! This style and shoe fits perfect for me! They are made in Israel so I appreciate them even more! Great price! Worth every penny because they last a long time and wear well!
customer_reviews.author: Ellarose Pinkus

customer_reviews.title: These Comfort Sandals are Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are stylish and casual. Great for walking all day wearing a maxi dress. The arch support is average when it comes to comfort sandals. I recommend if you want more than average arch to add it. The removable sole in these shoes conforms to the shape of your foot.
customer_reviews.author: R.J

customer_reviews.title: They have great support
customer_reviews.text: I was born with flat feet and these are the only shoes I can wear to walk or stand. They are extremely comfortable and attractive also.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Dargoltz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable I can walk all day at Disney and Universal!
customer_reviews.author: M. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: These are a winner!
customer_reviews.text: OMG....these shoes are so very comfortable and cute. Didn't require any "break in" and were comfortable right out of the box. This is my first pair of Naot but won't be my last! Love that they have removable insoles and can be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: kATHERINE K.  Emery

customer_reviews.title: I love Naot shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Naot shoes....especially at Amazon prices. These are wonderful shoes. I have them in two colors and love them both.
customer_reviews.author: M. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Get one size larger
customer_reviews.text: Look and feel great. My orthotics fit perpectly in them. My last pair of naots were a size 39, so that's what I ordered, but they were too small, I returned them and got a size 40 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: A. SWEAT

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love this style from Naot footwear company. the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Fan

customer_reviews.title: they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have these shoes in three colors. More stylish than a typical "comfort" shoe, they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Had them stretched and they are good to go
customer_reviews.text: Had them stretched and they are good to go! Best sandal style I ever bought, this is pair 4. Sad they are discontinued by Naot.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Napolitan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Naot. The replaceable liner beds sold me on their shoes years ago.
customer_reviews.author: johannah siragusa

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe last year in Bronze and that's when I fell in love with them. I was wearing them all the time. They are so comfortable. Now I have a second pair in the Metal color. They are perfect too. They say 3 is the charm. I may have to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Walker

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Sandals
customer_reviews.text: The Paris is my favorite style Naot sandal; very attractive for long toes. This is my 4th pair, love the metallic color, but the straps around my toes are tight. However, from experience I know the leather on these sandals loosen to a comfortable fit by the 3rd wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute online, not cute on my foot
customer_reviews.text: The footbed was too long. Perhaps someone with more normal feet would like this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy T.

customer_reviews.title: otherwise the fit was fine. I had to return them
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were too narrow across the toes, otherwise the fit was fine. I had to return them. I'm going to order another style where I can adjust a strap across the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Harroun

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe
customer_reviews.text: My shoes arrived within just a couple days of placing my order and it is a beautiful shoe. The downfall for me is that I have bunions and it was not wide enough for my foot. Everything else about the shoe was wonderful and felt very comfortable, so I hated that I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: mom22

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have a rather narrow foot, even though it's a size 12. And the proportionality of my foot front-to-back is not the design of most size 11-12 shoes. But these are perfect. Also the heel section of the shoe is fairly level, unlike most shoes with any heel. [Most continue back at an upward angle, putting all your weight on the forefoot -- which soon becomes uncomfortable.] They have the removable/replaceable Naot cork insoles which mold to your foot and are comfortable as always.
customer_reviews.author: JudyG

customer_reviews.title: The MOST comfortable sandal ever!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and I wear them every where, with everything. I have two pair and love how they look but mostly how they feel.
customer_reviews.author: Raine Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were fine and fit as expected. But, they just weren't what I was looking for ....
customer_reviews.author: GwarrenVa

customer_reviews.title: Arch and metatarsal support
customer_reviews.text: Toe area very loose. Footbed did not seem to have usual support
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Love Naot Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Naot shoes, are soft and very comfortable. The color also is also very nice.. they are just like is described.
customer_reviews.author: TamayoMA

customer_reviews.title: Look and Feel GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They form a "boat" around my foot. I do alot of walking. They never have hurt my feet. Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hope

customer_reviews.title: My second pair
customer_reviews.text: This style fits my foot beautifully. I can wear these shoes all day, walking, sitting, standing, and experience no foot, ankle, or knee discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Comp Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love Naot Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Naot is my favorite brand since I have to use orthotics. They are not too wide for my foot which prevents any slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoe and Comfortable Too!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. In fact I have it in 3 colors and each offers a slightly different look. I find this shoe comfortable, and I have very bad feet. So I just purchased the black patent to go with a very dressy blouse and pants, so I'll be fine dancing and moving around for an entire evening. I measure 8 1/2 and find this sandal just long enough, whereas the 40 is definitely too long for me in this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Subeekay

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, comfortable. This is my third pair in this style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Sandal Ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sandals I have ever owned. This is my 3rd pair. Well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals.
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. This is my fifth pair of this style of Naot sandals. There is no "breaking" them in. They just feel good from day one. I pretty much wear them every day from mid-May to the end of September. The Naot sandals usually only last me two summers before they look too worn out and I have to order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaShoe

customer_reviews.title: I would probably like them better if I went a size up but ...
customer_reviews.text: I would probably like them better if I went a size up but I ended up returning them as the straps were also a little tight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and good looking, these go from casual to dressy easily. Naot has another winner!
customer_reviews.author: Jean A. Proehl

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but. . . .
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like these shoes because Naots are one of the best shoes I've even bought. However, the strapping rubbed my bunions the wrong way. The leather would probably have softened over time, but at the price of these shoes, I didn't want to take that chance. Also, I hate to say it, but they do look a little like "old lady shoes". I do have two other styles of Naots (Relate and Kayla sandals) and I would highly recommend the brand. With the other shoes, I put them on and they felt as if I'd been wearing them for a long time, they were so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: C. H. M.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have had plantar fasciitis since mid January, have tried three different inserts, two other brands of shoes, stretching, ice, that flexer thing at night all with minimal results. These shoes are the fix! I bought two other naots and were them all exclusively and the pain has been almost gone (still feel a slight bit if I walk barefoot around the house). these shoes instantly take the pain away.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R.

product_meta.title: NAOT Women's Paris Above The Knee Sandal
product_meta.description: The paris is an great everyday sandal with a backstrap for extra stability and support. This sandal has a hook and loop closure at the instep for adjustability and a unique criss-cross strap front to help hold the foot in place. Naot's removable anatomic cork and latex footbed is wrapped in pampering suede and molds to the foot with wear. The cosmopolitan collection features a 2" polyurethane sole with a metal shank and is extremely lightweight and durable.
feature_bullets: Scandinavian cork and latex covered in suede
Crisscross strap to help the foot in place
Hook and loop closure for adjustability
